page.title: 05CHURCH FENTON SHOPS
page.content: Church Fenton has{two shops}one is a {Post Office}selling sweets and newspapers and the other,{a general {store,}sells food and household items. {Mobile shops}sell bread, meat, fish and groceries. These shops are important especially to old people and housewives whose husbands use the family's car to commute to work. Most people use the local shops 2_3 times a week as they are convenient and need support. Main shopping is done at supermarkets as they are cheaper and offer more choice. { {Buckles}(general store) open 6 days,9_5:30pm.Ave 150 customers per day.Van to deliver goods.Turnover increased recently due to village development.Friendly service given.People pop in for a chat but are often prevented by the noise of the planes.
